May 2, 1969
Mr. John Macy, Jr.
President
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
Suite 630
1250 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington, D.C. 30036
Dear John:
I want Ho add my own expressions of gratitude to those
of Bob Mott for the grant for moving the National Educa¬
tional Radio Network to Washington, As you know, this
move has long been contemplated, but, until now^ has not
been feasible.
With this assistance we will be able to establish the
Network headquarters in Washington from where we feel it
can be projected into a new level of usefulness to its
affiliates and help substantially to strengthen education¬
al radio nationally.
Sincerely yours.
William G. Harley
WGH:cq
